titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the pay retention provisions of such title to certain prevailing rate employees whose basic pay would otherwise be subject to reduction pursuant to a wage survey.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, OPM.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/29/1987--Introduced. Extends Federal law regarding pay retention to certain prevailing rate Federal employees (blue-collar workers) whose basic pay would otherwise be subject to reduction pursuant to a wage survey.
